alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 09 at 3:50PM CST until December 09 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN SIMPSON AND NORTHEASTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 350 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Georgetown, or 7 miles east of Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Georgetown, Hopewell, and Union around 355 PM CST. Harrisville around 400 PM CST. Braxton around 410 PM CST. D`Lo around 420 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
